entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clean up FileSystemWatcher tests use of temp files #68430
  • How to control HttpConnectionPool throttle? #68423
  • Pkcs12Kdf can stack overflow with an exceptionally large password #68419
  • Support for HTTPS proxy #68416
  • Improve handling of lazy loops in regex source generator / compiler #68415
    7.0.0
  • Looping method call in a BackgroundWorker does an access violation instead of a StackOverflowException #68413
  • JIT_PInvoke asm stubs missing for i386 #68411
  • [HTTP/3] Typo in the header's name #68407
    7.0.0
  • ECMA-335 clarification about assignable-to relation #68403
  • DevToolsProxy::Run: Exception System.ArgumentException: The tasks argument included a null value. (Parameter 'tasks') #68402
  • [wasm-threads] Don't hardcode PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE #68397
  • Console can allocate too much on the stack with a custom encoding #68395
  • Cannot run tests outside of nativeaot folder #68394
  • CI Test Failure: Wasm.Build.Tests.MainWithArgsTests.NonAsyncMainWithArgs #68393
  • #65738 causes SIGSEGV running helloworld on linux-x86 preview 3 #68391
  • [wasm][debugger] Add support for ValueTypes in DebuggerProxyAttribute #68390
  • System.IO.Ports support for Android #68389
  • HostFxr fails to Initialize the host context when tried from a Native Code which is a Part of another .Net App #68388
  • Failure processing application bundle. Bundle header version compatibility check failed. #68387
    7.0.0
  • DateTime.ParseExact/ToString: inconsistent handling of abbreviated month names (MMM) in culture de-DE #68385
  • Running dotnet test in libraries failing to execute net462 targets #68384
  • [QUIC] Support opening a new QUIC stream on the first connection that has streams available. #68380
    7.0.0
  • Test failed: GC\LargeMemory\API\gc\gettotalmemory\gettotalmemory.cmd #68376
  • Make `mono` CSP Compliant #68374
  • HTTP/2: Possible race when receiving HEADERS and RST_STREAM together #68373
  • HttpResponseMessage.ToString() prints Content as an object #68369
  • Enterprise authentication tests are failing with PlatformNotSupportedException #68366
  • Extract_HardLinkEntry_TargetInsideDirectory test from System.Formats.Tar.Tests fails on Android/iOS/tvOS #68360
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.MemorySendReceiveTest.SendReceive_Concurrent_Success test fails on CI #68359

Closed

  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Mariomkas #68429
  • [release/7.0-preview3] Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b311420\\b311420\\b311420.cmd #67558
  • Many libraries tests are not robust against line endings #66600
  • Arm64: Forward memset/memcpy to CRT implementation #67326
    7.0.0
  • Replace OSX_ARM64_ABI define with a runtime flag. #45501
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests #67031
    7.0.0
  • Support system-wide enforcement of default authentication with proxy #66587
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests timing out in the CI #64389
  • `Libraries Test Run checked coreclr OSX x64 Debug` failing to unzip test assets #67159
  • [NativeAOT arm64] application using sha1 and sha2 Instruction Sets does nothing and quits #68315
  • System.Net.Security.Tests ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails on Server 2022 #65098
    7.0.0
  • BinaryData.Empty.ToString throws ArgumentNullException #68262
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RetryOnConnectionFailure #61257
    Future
  • Read_Archive_File failing due to access denied to tar/pax/file.tar #68357
  • Rolling build CI failure: System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWithTests.LongContinuationChain_Await_DoesNotStackOverflow #67768
  • [API Proposal]: Get info about generic attributes #64169
    7.0.0
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics tests failed with "almost" empty logs #67233

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM refactoring to support LLVM 14.x. #68426
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    community-contribution
  • Use checked arithmetic to prevent stack overflow in Pkcs12Kdf #68422
    area-System.Security
  • [debugger] Fix debugging wasm sample #68421
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: run remorph stress before fgRemoveDeadBlocks #68420
  • Fix entry point for waveOutGetDevCaps #68418
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add more diagnostics to intermittently failing assert in JSON #68414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix header upgrade-insecure-requests name #68412
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix potential stack overflow in StdInReader #68398
    area-System.Console
  • Consolidate `MessageBox` API usage #68396
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Copy the LLVM jobs into their own pipeline #68392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixing and improving the `BOX;BR[COND]` pattern match #68382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable runtime tests on Windows ARM64v8 queues #68377
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add retries to some FSW tests #68368
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Removed GT_MSUB in favor of a simple containment check. #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • fixes in transition blowup and removing recursion from RegexNode conversion #68307
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Disable GetProviderNames_AssertProperties #68417
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Implement `fgSetTreeSeq` via `GenTreeVisitor` #68383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Treat `INDEX` as a potentially throwing operation #68381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleaning up write barrier code #68124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Have CpBlkUnroll and InitBlkUnroll use SIMD registers #68085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added Fixes for LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests and Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators #68303
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • add support for parsing empty user and password as DefaultCredentials #68312
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove DEBUG_ARG_SLOTS #68319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid passing gshared methods to the jit_done callback. #68404
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Build rolling release jits #68229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid stress log shutdown race condition #64722
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rename superpmi-asmdiffs -> superpmi-diffs #68378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix lazy loop IndexOf optimization #68400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Reduce pressure on backtracking stack in RegexCompiler / source generator #68364
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix a randomly failing JS test #67945
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure floating-point types write the exponent/significand as little-endian #68331
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0-preview4] Backport new Tar APIs #68337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix managed/unmanaged mismatch in arm64 NativeAOT definitions of required instruction sets #68375
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix unintentional boxing on every newline in GetCharKindWithAnchor #68370
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Disable Extract_HardLinkEntry_TargetInsideDirectory test from System.Formats.Tar.Tests on mobile #68362
    area-System.IO
  • BinaryData.Empty.ToString throws ArgumentNullException #68349
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Only build the GC simulator tests in the GC simulator leg #68177
    area-Infrastructure
  • If the user has < 65 cores and passes in an affinitized range for the 0th CPU group, if valid, honor it. #68283
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow sharing of input tar file for read #68361
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove MarshalUsingAttribute when System.AggressiveAttributeTrimming is on #68350
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, linkable-framework
  • Remove unused libs.packages subset #68345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow custom attribute filtering with an open generic type. #68158
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix warnings in System.Private.Xml due to two PRs that raced #68358
    area-Meta
  • Remove SystemNative_GetUnixName() PAL function #68342
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Changed GT_MADD to not emit 'msub' #68088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Regex.Tests: Disable test that tries to blow the stack, on AOT #67175
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Measure JIT TP in superpmi-diffs #68292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Spill low ref count vector that has lot of save/restore #66161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP] Faster vsd hashtables #67609
    area-VM-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update Android Docker build image #68354
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Add requested version to hostfxr_resolve_sdk2 #68355
    area-Host
  • Do not use '.NET Core' anymore in error messages #68260
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #67848
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update debpkg container image to ubuntu 18 #68351
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Remove GT_ARGPLACE nodes #68140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Mark only first indirection of block copies as faulting #67747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load #68203
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove usage of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Postpone dispose of sendContentCacnellationToken for HTTP3 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [Android] Enable System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/6.0] Do not reset assigned interval twice #68327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #67419
    area-System.Net.Http, no-recent-activity
  • Don't build non shared framework refs in ref build #68275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Condition S.S.Cryptography tests on SHA1 signature support #67998
    area-System.Security
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #68352
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing #68258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
